Obfuscate text
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. py:module:: langsim.modules.fake_language.obfuscate

+------------+-----------------------------------------+
| Path       | langsim.modules.fake_language.obfuscate |
+------------+-----------------------------------------+
| Executable | yes                                     |
+------------+-----------------------------------------+

Introduce random noise into a corpus.


Inputs
======

+--------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| Name   | Type(s)                                                       |
+========+===============================================================+
| corpus | TarredCorpus<RawTextLinesDocumentType>                        |
+--------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| vocab  | :class:`Dictionary <pimlico.datatypes.dictionary.Dictionary>` |
+--------+---------------------------------------------------------------+

Outputs
=======

+--------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| Name   | Type(s)                                                  |
+========+==========================================================+
| corpus | :class:`~langsim.datatypes.raw_lines.RawTextLinesCorpus` |
+--------+----------------------------------------------------------+

Options
=======

+-------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------+
| Name  | Description                                                                                     | Type  |
+=======+=================================================================================================+=======+
| noise | Noise level to introduce. Probability for each character that it will be obfuscated in some way | float |
+-------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------+
